natspec.details: This contract implements a proxy that is upgradeable by an admin. This is the core of the Aegis Framework - enabling secure upgrades while maintaining state.

AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is changed.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

constructor.details: Initializes an upgradeable proxy managed by `_admin`.

params._data: Data to send as msg.data to the implementation to initialize the proxied contract.

natspec.title: AegisProxy
